website_summaries.verdict: The Flip UltraHD 1 Hour is an OK entry-level mini camcorder if you just need something simple to shoot and share video, but there are better options.
cons: lacks new FlipPort for add-on accessories

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: This camera is exactly what you should expect. There are no moving parts. Fixed focal length. But it performs exceedingly well w/in the parameters of this very limited ability. I LOVE it. It fits into my pocket and takes 2 AA batteries. It is idiot-simple to use. I can capture candid photos. The camera takes only a moment to activate. Compared to video cameras that are several hundreds dollars - the warm-up time is impressive! If I 2 seconds to anticipate something I want to capture then I can whip it out and grab some authentic moments. This is a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: average_user

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera! Anyone can use it. For those wondering about the lack of image stabilization, I haven't found that to be an issue so far. 4GB works for me as well. I expect if I go on a long trip, I'll just bring one of my netbooks with me to offload the videos from the camera. The FlipShare software that installs from the camera seems easy to use. Note: it will try to update the FlipShare software immediately if you are connected to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Good Bird

customer_reviews.title: Instant movies
customer_reviews.text: The Flip Video is a compact pocket video that is simple to use. It provides HD Videos simple to upload and play in the computer or on the TV. It is a rugged instrument that can withstand some harsh treatment. I am well pleased with the video quality and serviceability.
customer_reviews.author: Smeckatella

customer_reviews.title: Not Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: "Power up with the included standard AA batteries. And for even better charge time, try using the Flip Video Rechargeable Battery Pack [sold separately]" This is the quote that I took off the Amazon website for this camera. So I bought the Flip Video Rechargeable Battery Pack (separately) when I bought the Flip UltraHD Video Camera, but it does NOT work with this camera. Not only does it not work, it doesn't even fit into the battery compartment. The camera is great, but the suggestion to buy a battery that doesn't work for the camera is not. If we are supposed to purchase something else, it was totally unclear.
customer_reviews.author: artgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love my ultra hd flip camera
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this flip camera highly. I only have one regret...I wish that I had gotten the one that has two hours and image stabilization. But I haven't actually needed it, I'm just saying if I did. If you are making a lot of videos, spring for the two hour one. I use this camera for videos of my new grandsons and it has been great cuz all they do is lay there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jans45

customer_reviews.title: Flip is neat for taking videos
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for christmas. He kept trying to borrow mine. Comes with software in the camera which downloads when you plug it into the computer. I really enjoy posting on Facebook and Flip makes it easy to do so. Also can make photos from the videos. You can do a lot with this technology, I still haven't learned it all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: obsolete
customer_reviews.text: Gave this away. Smart phones are better and easier to use for video.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My father in law has a hard time with electronic devices. When we had our son, we wanted to give him a way to capture and view moments easily. The one button start and stop recording is perfect for him. I would recommend this item to anyone. The ease is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: H C-V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to make mediocre youtube videos like these. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Chirurgeon Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to capture footage from my first trip to Las Vegas and it was definitely worth every penny i spent on it. Battery life could be improved a bit since it seems to be high drain, but its definitely worth owning this item, especially is using rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Giacomello

customer_reviews.title: 11 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality images and sound! It does eat regular batteries rather quickly, but once we started using eneloop batteries, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Flip Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this. no tech degree needed to operate and the picture quality is excellent. Be sure to get the tripod with the camera.. its a must..
customer_reviews.author: G. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was recording the same it was second time I used it. It just stopped working, sad to have made the decision to buy it. And I was beyond the return period. In-fact it was the first electronic item that has ever done this to me :(
customer_reviews.author: abi

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: broke in 2 days dont buy the camera it sucked it would not hook up to my pc and it would frezze every 10 secounds and the sliver part broke inside they gave me my full money back i will not buy from them again but they do have great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great product...great price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is extremely easy to use. It's just point and click the red button to start and stop.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I take this camera EVERYWHERE. I love it!! The only thing is, it eats through AA batteries. My recommendation is to get some rechargeable ones. But all in all it's one of the best purchases I have made.
customer_reviews.author: ksb1001

customer_reviews.title: Flip Ultra HD Camera
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Used it for all the holiday festivities. The only thing that is bad about it is that it doesnt have a Battery Indictor on it. You do not know how much battery life you have left. Carry some extra batteries with you...
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: WHY SHOULD YOU GET A FLIP CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This camera is thin and light.it's so portable.thought its more a video camera it's the best i've seen.So get the flip if you have any douts !it's number 1. ; )
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little video camera, however it has one flaw. I purchased this for my sister because she enjoys recording random videos to post to youtube and she thoroughly enjoyed this camera until the dreadful "LOW BATTERY" sign popped up after 30 minutes of use. We might have received a defective camera, however this problem was resolved quickly through Amazon's amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia "Klay"

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, get the message that it's overheated. Can't run setup or even keep it on for more than 10 seconds. Not impressed particularly on Christmas morning! ARGH!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: flip video camera
customer_reviews.text: liked the video camera but had problems with it getting to hot. recieved good technical support and was able to return and recieve another one with no issues
customer_reviews.author: tracijo

customer_reviews.title: ok, but no FOCUS!!
customer_reviews.text: this was my first camcorder, and i must say that it takes wonderful quality videos!! can zoom, great for vlogging and everything like that. the only problem that i have is that it does. not. focus. whenever i hold anything up to the camera its all blurry and it has really been getting on my nerves. this isn't a big deal for some people, but if its important, do not get this camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

product_meta.title: Flip UltraHD Video Camera - Blue, 4 GB, 1 Hour
product_meta.description:
The new Flip UltraHD video camera combines Flip Video's signature shoot-and-share simplicity with amazing HD. Simply power on and press record to start capturing up to 1 hour of incredible HD video. When you're done recording, just connect the flip-out USB arm to a PC or Mac and use pre-loaded FlipShare software to organize, edit and share your videos.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
FLIP ULTRAHD (1 HOUR) OVERVIEW
 * Shoot up to 1 hour of amazing HD video on the easy-to-use, pocket-sized UltraHD
 * Press the big red button to start capturing vibrant HD video (720p / 30fps) on the super-simple user interface
 * Comes with 4 GB of built-in memory, letting you capture up to 1 hour of HD video; no additional memory cards required
 * Power up with the included standard AA batteries. And for even better charge time, try using the Flip Video Rechargeable Battery Pack [sold separately]
 * Connect the built-in USB arm to your PC or Mac® to launch pre-loaded FlipShare™ software
 * Use FlipShare software to organize and edit your videos, capture photos, send video greeting cards and create custom movies
 * Share videos privately using FlipShare's attachment-free email or by creating Flip Channels; post publicly with direct video shares to Facebook™, Twitter™ and YouTube™
 * Watch your videos on your HDTV by connecting your UltraHD to your HDTV with the Flip Video HDMI ™ Mini Cable (type C) [sold separately]
 * Record high-quality H.264 HD videos that are compatible with most video-playing applications, including Windows Media Player, QuickTime Player, and iTunes
 * Video: 16:9 widescreen, HD 720p (1280 x 720) at 30 frames per seconds (fps) progressive scan; recorded as MP4 files
 * Included in package: Flip UltraHD video camera, two standard AA batteries, user guide


FLIP ULTRAHD HIGHLIGHTS
Ultra Simple
The new Flip UltraHD video camera combines Flip Video's signature shoot-and-share simplicity with the power of HD video. UltraHD could not be easier to use: just power on, press record, and you'll be capturing incredible HD. UltraHD features 1 hour of record time and included standard AA batteries, so you'll never miss another minute of video again.

Ultra Fun
With its pocket-sized design, UltraHD lets you capture video anytime, anywhere. Whether it's a lazy afternoon in the park, a family vacation, or a simple everyday moment, your UltraHD will be ready to go. And show off your personality with the Ultra colorful lineup; brilliant white, vibrant magenta and metallic blue.

Ultra Amazing
UltraHD combines signature Flip Video quality with HD 720p resolution and 30 frames per second to offer vibrant HD video. And with 4 GB of built-in memory, UltraHD lets you capture up to 1 hour of HD video with no additional memory cards. UltraHD thrives in all types of lighting environments, and with premier AAC audio your videos will sound simply amazing. Plus the included HDMI™ output makes it easy to enjoy your videos on your HDTV. 



PRE-LOADED FLIPSHARE SOFTWARE—NOW WITH DIRECT UPLOAD TO TWITTER
UltraHD comes pre-loaded with FlipShare™ software, which makes it easy to organize, create and share your videos: 

 * Organize your videos by dragging and dropping into folders you've created, or use the automatic date-stamped folders
 * Edit and trim your favorite videos clips or even add your own music, all using FlipShare's easy editing tools
 * Create video greeting cards or use the Magic Movie feature to make movies with the click of a button
 * Capture photos using the easy Snapshot feature. You can grab a still-image photo from any of the 30 frames that comprise each second of your video
 * Share privately using FlipShare's attachment-free email. Or create private Flip Channels, the easiest way to share videos and photos with groups of friends and family
 * Post online by sharing directly to Facebook™, Twitter™ and YouTube™



RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES:

Flip Video Power Adapter 
This compact adapter's USB port connects to your Flip camcoder’s USB arm. Flip Video Tripod 
The tripod screws into your Flip, and flexible legs let you take steady video almost anywhere. Flip Ultra Underwater Case 
Shoot thrilling video safely under water with full access to camcorder controls. Flip Ultra Battery Pack 
Rechargeable NiMH Battery provides 2.5 hours of recording time, recharges when connected to USB. Flip Video HDMI Cables 
Watch HD video shot with your MinoHD 2nd Gen or Flip UltraHD camcorder directly on your HDTV. Flip Video Action Tripod 
Unfold tripod legs and for steady video or use attachable straps to record action-packed video.
feature_bullets: Shoot up to 1 hour of amazing HD video on the easy-to-use, pocket-sized UltraHD
Press the big red button to start capturing vibrant HD video (720p / 30fps) on the super-simple user interface
Comes with 4 GB of built-in memory, letting you capture up to 1 hour of HD video; no additional memory cards required
Connect the built-in USB arm to your PC or Mac to launch pre-loaded FlipShare software
Organize, create and share your videos with FlipShare software
